name: RMD-MP
savepath: This update adds in 'Easter Eggs' to celebrate the holiday. These Easter Eggs can drop from any monster and will provide varying bonuses when consumed. There may also be a hidden easter egg that can be obtained with alternate methods...Have fun!

D2RLAN has continued to evolve and push the boundaries of what's possible, while making it as easy-to-use and control as possible. Update 1.2.7 continues that trend; expanding the save file limit, implementing a stash paging system, and allowing socket counts to be displayed with items. These features are made available for all mods, so I hope you can enjoy them fully!
